app.title: DeepSite
app.subtitle: Imagine and Share with One Click

settings.title: Configuration
settings.configHint: OpenAI model and API URL can be configured through environment variables. See the .env.example file in the project.

modelParams.title: Model Parameters
modelParams.maxTokensDesc: Controls the maximum number of tokens to generate. Larger values allow for longer responses but may require more processing time.
modelParams.temperatureDesc: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values produce more deterministic content, higher values produce more creative content.
modelParams.defaultValues: Default values: max_tokens = 64000, temperature = 0. These settings can also be configured as defaults in environment variables.

templates.toolsMultiSelect: Tools are optional and multiple can be selected
templates.uiOptional: UI component library is optional, you can use default settings
templates.requireVue3: Please select Vue 3 framework first to use component libraries
templates.requireFramework: Please select a framework first to choose tools

editor.resetConfirm: You are about to reset the editor. Are you sure?

askAI.placeholder: Ask AI to update your HTML...
askAI.working: Please wait while AI is working.

toast.contentRestored: Previous HTML content restored from local storage.

preview.saveFailed: Failed to save HTML to browser.
